channel.title: TCPs on Olivia Brode-Roger
channel.description: Recent content in TCPs on Olivia Brode-Roger

item.title: TCP
item.description:
Here I’m just playing around with D3, trying to get a basic TCP request animation to work.
rect { fill: steelblue; } circle { fill: steelblue; } .sender circle { fill: orange; } .receiver circle { fill: steelblue; } text { fill: white; text-anchor: end; font: 10px sans-serif; } var width = 420, height = 420; var tcp_send = [1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8], lag = 1; // Setup var chart = d3.
